name: 南国育ち/Nangoku Sodachi
description:
After debuting in 2004, Pachislo Nangoku Sodachi became a huge hit and has now come to Steam!
An A400 type equipped with stock functions, this machine has taken the world by storm due to its easy-to-understand bonus notification system whereby a rotary beacon light flashes and revolves when the player wins a bonus. The machine’s greatest feature is its playability, with players securing a bonus one-game series when the Butterfly Lamp flashes. Selecting the Experiential Machine Mode, players can enjoy games that only various forcing functions. and similar apps can provide.

■What is Pachislo?
1. A Pachislo is a gaming machine that is played by borrowing and inserting medals (tokens).
2. Players insert three or more medals into the medal slot and then pull the lever on the left-hand side of the machine down.
3. Pulling the lever causes the reel to begin revolving, and players stop the drum revolving by pressing the stop button.
4. The player wins when they get a line-up of bonus symbols on the screen.
5. Once the player wins, all subsequent games are bonus games, and the bonus games end when the player reaches the prescribed number of medals for payout.
